channel.title: Posts on Programming Blockchain
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Programming Blockchain

item.title: Interactive Two Day Programming Seminar
item.description: Learn the ins and outs of blockchain development in this interactive 2-day seminar. Programmers will learn the details of how Bitcoin works including live coding challenges to sharpen their skills. They will learn: Finite Fields Elliptic Curves Elliptic Curve Cryptography Signing/Verifying messages Encrypting/Decrypting messages Parsing Transactions Signing Transactions Script parsing and processing Address construction Parsing Blocks Validating Proof-of-Work Difficulty Calculations Merkle Tree Construction Merkle Proofs Network Message Parsing

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Programmers attending this seminar are expected to know: Basics of Bitcoin Intermediate Programming Some Python Programmers should bring: Laptop with Python installed

item.title: Sign Up
item.description: Space is limited to 30 students. Cost: 0.5 BTC per student. Email to reserve your spot!
